short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to press CMD + K and open an enhanced search on NetSuite, faster and packed with more features!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension adds an enhanced NetSuite global search experience, showing the same results but with a few more features:

- Search results are cached so they're shown faster than regular NS search.
- Recent searches appear at the top.
- Everything can be done with keyboard shortcuts
